properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 4 at 3:25PM MST until February 8 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow, with additional
accumulations of around one inch this evening. For the Winter
Storm Watch, heavy snow possible late Wednesday night through
Friday evening. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches
possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000
Feet, and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet.

* WHEN...Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening.
Winter Storm Watch, from late Wednesday night through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could
cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
